titleInfo.title: Images of Copper Hill and Copper Basin

mods.note: 3 tifs. Three images of the barren ground and hills near the mines of Copperhill, Tennessee. The Ducktown-Copperhill area in Polk County, Tennessee was one of the first mining areas in Tennessee, where mining begin in 1847. Copper mining in the area did not end until 1987 and the area was stripped of timber and the land was deprived of vegetation.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
